body:
https://github.com/numpy/numpy/releases/tag/v1.22.3

@rgommers I have a question for you. I noticed that in `pyproject.toml` all of the build deps are pinned to specific versions. Do they have to be pinned, or can they work with other versions as well? We don't currently pin anything in Spack and things seem to be fine so far.
title: py-numpy: add v1.22.3
